name: CliffSide (Grochlin)
description:
Please Play in Fullscreen for the intended experience! (in other words all the cheeky text I spent hours formatting is cropped by the embed.... oops.....)

--------------------------------------------

Delve deep into the cliffside ruins to find relix, then bring them back to your chest before the day is over! You have 5 days to recover as many relix as possible, but the sea level is rising rapidly! relix will erode if left underwater overnight, so be careful! To end a day early head to the camper.

-------------------------------------------

Gamepad Controls:

Left stick : move

bottom face button : jump / wall jump / swim

Right face button: pick up

left face button: throw / drop (if holding down left-stick)

top face button: throw all held

start: pause / adjust sound

select: skip text (for speedrunners only ;)

----------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls: 

arrow keys : move

spacebar : jump / wall jump / swim

D : pick up

S: throw / drop (if holding down-arrow key)

A: throw all held

TAB:  pause / adjust sound
